content: त्वर् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (त्वरत, त्वरित तूर्ण) To hurry, make haste, move with speed, do anything quickly; भवान्सुहृदर्थे त्वरतां <ls>M. 2</ls>; नानुनेतुमबलाः स तत्वरे <ls>R. 19. 38.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (त्वरयति) {@--1@} To cause to hasten, expedite, urge forward, accelerate; त्वरयोर्वशीं <ls>V. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 36.</ls> {@--2@} To call quickly away; <ls>Māl. 5. 25.</ls>
